generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation, designed for pedestrian use.
- building: Several residential buildings are visible on both sides of the road, including a multi-story white building on the left and parts of other structures on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and green hedges are present along the road and sidewalks, indicating abundant vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a partly cloudy sky, visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person wearing a light-colored jacket can be seen walking on the sidewalk to the left in the distance.
- traffic light: A green traffic light is clearly visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A directional sign reading "Unterer Eselsberg" is visible at the top right, and a small circular sign indicating a bicycle route is also visible on a pole near the traffic light.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including the one supporting the traffic light and the sign for "Unterer Eselsberg".
- car: A white car is visible in the distance, driving on the road ahead.
